content: pattern written by amy detjen for knitcircus yarns keep yourself warm in style with a fun two-color brioche cowl this project pairs a cheerful gradient yarn with a coordinating solid for a soft relaxed yet very warm fabric new update features doubled up infinity cowl size in addition to original this pattern is very easy to work if you are familiar with brioche stitch but won t teach you how if you don t already know we recommend checking out nancy marchant s site for great tutorials on working brioche with two colors 1 **find the smaller kit here ** 2 **find the infinity large kit here ** 3 1 http //www briochestitch com/two-color-brioche 2 https //knitcircus com/products/chromatic-cowl-kit-ready-to-ship 3 https //knitcircus com/products/chromatic-cowl-kit-infinity-size-ready-to-ship
